website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use coffee maker that makes an entire pot of coffee at whatever strength you want.
pros: Includes an LCD backlit display so you can easily see the adjustments available
The Bold Strength Selector allows you to select the strength of your coffee
Cord storage keeps extra cord length from hanging out on your counter
Includes a permanent filter that is easy to clean
cons: Not ideal for those who only drink a cup of coffee a day

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I've used this coffee maker almost everyday since I got it a couple months ago and have only had one minor issue with it. The handle on the filter basket broke off but it's not really a necessary feature. Makes a great cup of coffee, very easy to clean, and I'm happy to not have to buy and waste filters.
customer_reviews.author: RedBlueHazel

customer_reviews.title: Move on and find a better build product
customer_reviews.text: We have been with Amazon for about 3 years and this is our first product review. We've had this coffee maker for about a month and it leaks. If you add 10 cups of water, 5 of those cups will just dump out of the back of the machine. Save yourselves the hassle and the money folks. Move on and find a better built product.
customer_reviews.author: Lax

customer_reviews.title: I love Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Burner never worked. Brewed for two months....... then brewed sporadically. But Amazon made it right and gave me a full refund. I love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: barbara j

customer_reviews.title: 55 days and exploded! Who's cleaning my kitchen??
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly 55 days since we started to use this coffee pot & it exploded all over my kitchen ! The machine itself started making beeping noises without me even touching it. Up until today it was great but if an item only has less than a 60 working window & you can't return it, isn't that a scam?? Coffee makers should last longer than 55 days. Sad. Dissatisfied. Do I chance another? Will u make good & either send me another maker, overnight (no cost to me I am a prime member), or issue me credit asap! Pls swiftly reply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons coolest client

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a non working coffee pot that was previously returned by another customer. The coffee pot was dirty and there was a return authorization slip still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Y.

customer_reviews.title: I use the programming light as a night light in my kitchen - love this coffee pot :)
customer_reviews.text: So far I have no complaints, I've used it for only a week and will come write a new review if I have any issues. Coffee tastes great, way better than my Gevalia and Mr Coffee machines, and I don't care that the top takes two hands to open because it closes securely so there's less water loss due to steam escaping from the top while it's brewing. Programming works, and I love the light for when the programming is on - my anxious brain knows for sure that i set the program for the morning, and I can even use it as a night light!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Radsvick

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Didn't make coffee as hot as we like it. Washer popped off of it very easily when I washed it and now it doesn't work and just past the expiration of the return date. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a HOT cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker. Makes a very hot cup of coffee. Easy to set time and program. Pot pours well too, no dribbling like other brands I have owned. Filling the reservoir is easy too. Depth of machine is nice too, taking up less space than my previous machine.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. I had a keurig but I hated all the waste of the k cups and it was a hassle to make more than one cup so I gave it to my sister and bought this. I love that it has a filter that’s reusable (no plastic waste!) and buying packaged coffee is less expensive than k cups and taste better in my opinion. I’ve used it for coffee and teas and would purchase again if I had to. The only down side is the carafe is very thin glass so be careful washing it out and bumping it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen so anything that has more height instead of width is a winner for me. Very nice looking coffee maker with easy to read buttons. It will at times leak when I pull out the pot and lid can be a little difficult to open at times but overall a winner.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.57

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is OK but dont break the carafe
customer_reviews.text: It brews OK coffee. However the carafe can break easily as it's very thin. Ours broke and now we have a decorative brewer. The carafe is impossible to replace it, in that they DO NOT have a replacement carafes available at all, from the Bella the manufacturer or via Amazon. Additionally, the carafe isn't compatible with any generic brand. Bella has sub-par customer service as well, it took two weeks for them to tell us they don't have a replacement carafes - it took two emails and real-life PHONE call.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: It is good. I like that it comes with a reusable ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this coffee maker for over a month now. It is good. I like that it comes with a reusable filter so that we do not have to buy paper filters. It looks modern and chic. Easy to set up and program. After the coffee is done brewing, a timer starts to time how long the coffee has been sitting there. Love this coffee maker and features! 4 stars because it brews loudly and sometimes drips.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: This is such a clean and easy unit that makes excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is such a clean and easy unit that makes excellent coffee. We were surprised that it makes such good coffee. Our last unit lasted 7 years and was expensive. This one is easy to clean, well made, and very quiet. Only issue with us personally, is that we had to purchase a separate grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Connito

customer_reviews.title: Pour into your mug over sink, pour spout is shaped wrong! Came fast!
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 in the past 11 or so years. Hubby drinks coffee all day long, so we use a coffee maker a lot. The other 2 older models did not come with a good pour spout,like the Cook brand does, but these worked great, just need a paper filter, because some of the smallest grinds of coffee go right through the permanent filter. and pour your coffee over the sink, because pour spout is almost non existing! Hope it lasts as long as the older models, because nothing seems to anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but shoddy
customer_reviews.text: So pretty on the counter until it quit working and leaked coffee and water everywhere. Tossed it out. Back to disposable $19.99 mr coffee. Get a new one every 4 months and call it good.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Programmed to work for a few months before it breaks down
customer_reviews.text: I purchase my first coffee maker in March. It stopped heating the water to brew. I thought it was a common manufacturing issue so I returned it and had it replaced. A few months later, the replacement coffee maker has the same issue. If you need a throw away coffee maker, then this is perfect for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father as a gift. He likes it a lot. It is lightweight, and the perfect size. The timer function works very well, and it brews quickly and a good temperature. The spout where the coffee runs out clogs easily, which is the only complaint. Regular cleaning keeps this good though
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Winebarger

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker, I have been using for about a month and I am enjoying, hopefully last long.
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Seemed well built but we went back to another brand that seemed to brew the coffee better.
customer_reviews.text: It worked OK but seemed to scorch the coffee when holding it. Seemed well built but we went back to another brand that seemed to brew the coffee better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Larson

customer_reviews.title: I like this product, even with the design problem.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker, surprisingly light, has a design flaw; the drain into the carafe doesn't work if the carafe is all the way under. We deal with this by pulling the carafe back, up on the lip of the bottom plate. Does not need paper filters-but you have to keep the permanent one clean
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Perry

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Brews quickly. But as you pour a cup it spills down the side wasting coffee and making a big mess. Light weight and compact. Looks nice on counter. Includes reusable filter. Packaging normal and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: The Sugar Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my Bella coffeemaker however am sooo disappointed! My plate burned during the initial cleaning process ( brewing w pots of just water to cleaning out the system) and it leaks and spits while brewing. Its the loudest coffeemaker I've ever owned and I've owned low end and high end makers but will definitely go back yo either my Keurig or the good ole Mr Coffee:)
customer_reviews.author: L Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice. Love the stainless handle on it.
customer_reviews.author: SANDI D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee maker about a year ago. It works just great and makes a nice cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: FunnyFace5

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great, seems much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a housewarming gift to a friend. Very nice appearance and quality. The stainless appearance and carafe look great and make it appear as though it were much more expensive than it was. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ-Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Switched from Keurig to this
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Switched from Keurig to this. I mostly like the feature that allows me to program the machine to brew my coffee at a certain time. I wake up in the morning, walk downstairs and pour a cup off fresh brewed coffee. Way better than suddenly realizing your machine has to be refilled for a single cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: HSMomma

customer_reviews.title: very good coffee maker I can set it to make light ...
customer_reviews.text: very good coffee maker I can set it to make light or bold coffee with the same amount of coffee grounds
customer_reviews.author: Patti Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in my Bella coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in my Bella coffee pot. It is very slow brewing , and always has grounds in pot. I use correct cone filters. I have tried to make myself like it but I have finally broke down and bought a new one locally. Would you consider honoring a return even though I have passed the return date?
customer_reviews.author: Darlene P. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, but doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but this is the second Bella coffee maker I’ve had. The burner stopped working on each a little after the year mark. I’m so disappointed! What’s the point if every year I need to purchase a new coffee maker? Guess I’m going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Fourth coffeemaker purchase in 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't broke down yet! After a string of broken down coffepots in recent years, we will see how long this one will last....so far it's been over 30 days and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Emmendorfer

customer_reviews.title: You won't reget this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot. It brews very hot, the reusable filter is wonderful, and it's easy ti program. Once your coffee is done brewing it starts a 2 hour timer so you know when it will automatically shut off. And when it automatically shuts off it beeps to let you know. I've had it a month now and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: I like the coffee maker allot
customer_reviews.text: I like the coffee maker allot. There is only one thing I would change. It shuts off automatically after 2 hours. I am the only one who drinks coffee so it takes me longer than 2 hours to drink a pot. I wish it gave you the ability to choose how long before you want before it automatically shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working already. Previous coffee pot worked for about ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working already. Previous coffee pot worked for about 7 years . This 2 months don't buy.No help from company purchased it from.
customer_reviews.author: Crafts by Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee and looks great! I only wish the blue, back-lit clock stayed on all the time, not just when maker is turned on-- it would make great kitchen clock and it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working not even a year old it just stopped.
customer_reviews.author: dac

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker for the money. I love the cone filter and the size of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Merri

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this coffee maker for a couple of weeks and are thrilled with it!!! It works amazingly well and the price is incredible. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey LW

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I hope it lasts longer than my last two Mr. Coffees. Can't even get a year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee maker and works beautifully the only negative thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coffee maker and works beautifully the only negative thing I can think to say of it is the light is too bright and lights up my entire house at night when I set the coffee maker for an auto timer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great every day coffee pot. Love the style, looks nice on counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Very. Nice looking ! Looks like it would cost a lot more $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like the coffee pots style. I am having a issue with programming the coffee to start in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it could tip over easily because of the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned for the unsteadiness of the entire coffee maker. It seems like it could tip over easily because of the small rubber "feet" on the bottom of the coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: otherwise stylish & usually fine.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn't drip all the coffee, maybe depends on the grind, otherwise stylish & usually fine.
customer_reviews.author: tjtilly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awful first use leaked water all over kitchen counter and floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So long as the filter is seated properly excellent coffee.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, mine is still not that old yet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, mine is still not that old yet, but if it last two or three years I will be very pleased. It makes a great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee machine. Kind of big for a smaller kitchen! We use it every morning and have had no problems!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee pot. To be pretty inexpensive, it works very well and is easy operate.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Love the coffee pot and the flavor of the coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee pot and the flavor of the coffee that it brews. Don't like the fact that the caraffe drips when you try to pour a cup. I have to mop daily to keep up with the spills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's great! Easy to set up and program
customer_reviews.text: Have had this coffee maker for about a month. So far, it's great! Easy to set up and program, easy to use, and makes very tasty coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Nalls

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. It gives my kitchen a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: So fast
customer_reviews.text: So fast and easy to program! Comes with a reusable filter
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too surprising here. Like the reusable filter. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Blunden

customer_reviews.title: a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: wow impressed , looks and feels expensive, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon M

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 9 months but probably 6 months use
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 9 months now the coffee will not brew won't get hot the warmer pad under the coffee pot doesn't get hot. Probably only five to six months worth of actual use
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, works great and looks nice on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: hamptonsgirlfriday

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after three months of use. Water doesn't go through won't make coffee
customer_reviews.author: Syddy.Pop

customer_reviews.title: this product was terrible the coffee heating element burned out after 6 months ...
customer_reviews.text: this product was terrible the coffee heating element burned out after 6 months and I am still waiting on my refund .would never order again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Davis

customer_reviews.title: Loved it when I got the second one until after ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first one broken. Loved it when I got the second one until after about the 10 th use it won't send water thru it steams but no water. I'm returning if I can
customer_reviews.author: Joanne G.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Good for its price. The only issue is it is hard to open with the lid design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don't have to get up early to turn it on! It's kind of easy to clean but I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This coffee pot is awful. The lid does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot is awful. The lid does not attach properly and sometimes water overflows. There's only a single trickle of water that's not hitting all the grounds. Once carrafe broke we didn't bother replacing it just got a new coffemaker.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plastic cup is poorly made. A piece broke off the very 1st day !
customer_reviews.author: Jean Simmons

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It just officially broke after owning it for just a few months and on my birthday no less :-(
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Threlkeld Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: But another brand
customer_reviews.text: First time using...when I poured water into coffeemaker it all came out the bottom of the machine. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Naggar

customer_reviews.title: ... is about 1 month old and quit working not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Coffee pot is about 1 month old and quit working not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The carafe drips a lot when pouring water to fill or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Work one time and stopped brewing!! I would purchase another brand
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adequate coffeemaker. The programming function is temperamental but it's not something I consider essential to my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: The hot plate/ burner fell thru the bottom once the ...
customer_reviews.text: The hot plate/ burner fell thru the bottom once the coffee pot filled with coffee. This happened the first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying. Doesn't circulate the water fast enough. ...
customer_reviews.text: Regret buying. Doesn't circulate the water fast enough. Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: KRB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.... STOPS WORKING AFTER A WHILE.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after three onths of use. What a DUD!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Payton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only made my third pot of coffee and it seems to be doing very well. The carafe doesn't drip on the counter like my old one, which I like. It does take a little longer than my past coffee maker. The price is excellent and the flavor is good. A good buy
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Heads up, horrible machine!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker worked like a gem. For 3 months. Now it turns on and off randomly, takes over an hour to brew an 8 cup pot of coffee and does not stay warm. Horrible product. I may have just received a factory defected product and perhaps not all of these machines are of such poor quality. However, if you are a devout coffee drinker and depend on the machine you purchased with a timed setting, to brew your beverage the way it is advertised, then dont waste your money or time on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Brews the perfect cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't complain. Does everything as described.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing coffee maker. I love it and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel  Yudice

customer_reviews.title: I have a Nespresso Vertuoline machine that I love, but the capsules are expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nespresso Vertuoline machine that I love, but the capsules are expensive. So for day to day coffee, I use the Bella Classics machine. For the price that I paid, it's fantastic and makes really good coffee. It's also fast and the coffee comes out nice and hot. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: SO Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! It is still brewing drip by drip after 30 minutes. 6 cups of water makes 4 cups of coffee. I wish I could return it. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We have had this project a few months now and it works great. Makes good coffee. Nice to have a reusable filter.
customer_reviews.author: New Englander

customer_reviews.title: Good Coffee with a Cheap Filter
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes great coffee but the re-usable filter split down the seam after the 2nd use. So if I want to make more than a 4 cup pot it gets grounds in it and leaks. I'm disappointed. I might return it if I can't figure out how to get a replacement filter sent. Any idea how to do that?
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. Carafe broke and is no longer in production
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coffee maker. Works just fine. Carafe broke and is no longer in production! What? It's glass! I MIGHT break! Why no replacement parts?
customer_reviews.author: karie

customer_reviews.title: Initially it worked great. Two months in the digital read out would ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than three months. Initially it worked great. Two months in the digital read out would not work and the water would steam away, making a bare 2 cups of coffee from 12 cups of water. When we contacted the company to return, we find out they no longer make this particular model. Will not order from this company ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Clements

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Coffee Pot
customer_reviews.text: The coffee pot had a slight crack in it that we didn't fully notice until after the return window closed. Now we have to throw it out. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Ford

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the programmable feature and it doesn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the programmable feature and it doesn't work. Now it Isn't worth the cost of shipping it back so just out the money
customer_reviews.author: Merle H.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely upset that I did not get the stainless steel coffee pot. The only reason I ordered this one was bc I didn't want a glass pot with a burner. I loved the idea of a stainless steal pot and no burner. Guess you cant always get what you pay for. I've learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker only lasted 3 weeks. I would never spend another penny on this maker or BELLA products.. The first item lasted 2 month. I can't return this items because I threw out the box it came in. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: NYCCHIC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded us from the old Mr. Coffee & I'm so glad I did! This pot looks nice on the counter & makes a good pot of joe. I also love the fact that I don't need to buy coffee filters anymore! The only downside is the top of the machine is a little difficult to open, but other then that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I had a basic switch coffee maker before, so this is much nicer, but still simple enough. I've been using it for a month , so far no problems. It is a little bit loud, but I like that because I program it and it is my alarm clock. I love the features, and that it actually stops dripping when I grab some coffee while still brewing. The auto shutoff is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this coffee maker because of the reviews, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker because of the reviews, programability and price. The first machine I had to exchange because the programming function did not work. Amazon kindly sent a new one and the new machine did not program. So if you are looking for a coffee maker that is programable, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: K8Curren

customer_reviews.title: even better, please send me one
customer_reviews.text: The filter basket broke after three uses. Please give me a link where I can get a replacement or, even better, please send me one. So far I am rather unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: My Bella coffee maker has worked fantastic since day one
customer_reviews.text: My Bella coffee maker has worked fantastic since day one. Brews very quickly and is always hot. One review mentioned that there is no heating plate. That is flat out wrong. It’s very hot! What a great bargain for less than $20! I couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MakesScentsToMe.us

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffee pot but the picture shows and aluminum mug ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good coffee pot but the picture shows and aluminum mug and it comes with glass one. That's the only reason I bought it was cuz of the mug. And then it ain't with it. Misrepresentation. They should show you what you get
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Comes w built in filter
customer_reviews.text: I like this coffee machine. It allows me to make coffee or tea or soup. It’s great for the price and well worth the investment. It has a timer and automatic turnoff and you can insure it with amazon to go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: CNYC

customer_reviews.title: 5 starssss
customer_reviews.text: Great! First off, the coffee stays hot for a very long time. Which is really nice. Second, it's really easy to clean. The filter is easy to clean and reuse. Overall I'm extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary White

customer_reviews.title: yup. makes coffee
customer_reviews.text: love the timer, it does come with a filter basket as well, no need to buy one. makes great coffee on bold setting.
customer_reviews.author: josephus

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly after 4 days, the coffee would overflow instead filtering to the pot. You have to lift the pot up in order for the coffee to come down.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Mayfield Dioum

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee, hard to program even with directions
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker and easy to clean. However, even with following the directions in the pamphlet, it still can't program it to make coffee at a selected specific time. But luckily it doesn't take long to clean and refill.
customer_reviews.author: Davidson Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal. Much nicer than expected. The coffee was nice and hot with no plastic taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: Brews coffee, but every other time the filter basket does not slip in to place correctly and overflows and gets grounds in the pot. Terrible design flaw. Didn't realize it was so bad until after my return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: BELLA Classics 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Bold Brew Stainless and Chrome
product_meta.description: BELLA Classics 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Bold Brew Stainless and Chrome
feature_bullets: 950 Watt brewing system delivers 12 cups of bold and delicious piping hot cup of Joe in minutes with just one touch of a button
Bold strength selecting feature allows you to customize the coffee flavor to your prefered tastes
Wake up to a fresh pot of coffee every morning! Programmable up to 24hours - set it the night before to auto-start brew first thing in the morning
Pause and serve feature allows you to serve a cup of coffee anytime, even mid-brew! Simply pull and pour. Brewing will resume as you place carafe back in the unit
Includes permanent filter and coffee scoop. The permanent filter is dishwasher safe and has a removable brew basket that collects the used coffee grounds to minimize the mess
